tool_description: Performs targeted data deletion operations based on dependency analysis while maintaining data integrity and audit requirements.

deletion_order.description: Ordered list of data elements to delete from dependency analysis

retention_requirements.description: Data that must be retained from dependency analysis

dry_run.description: Whether to perform a simulation without actual deletion

backup_before_delete.description: Whether to create backup before deletion

batch_size.description: Number of records to process in each batch

confirmation_code.description: Required confirmation code for actual deletion (when dry_run is false)

error_messages: Confirmation required: Confirmation code is required when dry_run is false.
Invalid confirmation code: The provided confirmation code is incorrect or expired.
Deletion blocked: One or more items cannot be deleted due to system constraints.
Backup failed: Unable to create backup before deletion when backup_before_delete is true.
Invalid batch size: Batch size must be between 1 and 10000.
Insufficient permissions: User does not have required permissions for deletion operation.
usage: Provide customer_id, deletion_order, and retention_requirements from dependency analysis. Set dry_run to false with valid confirmation_code for actual deletion. Configure backup_before_delete and batch_size as needed.

operation_id.description: Unique identifier for this deletion operation

records_processed.description: Number of records processed during operation

records_retained.description: Number of records retained due to requirements

operation_status.description: Final status: completed, partial, or failed

error_details.description: Details of any errors encountered during deletion
